frameset.edef: to intend to or to do deliberately

example.parse: (VP (PRT (INTERROG_PART أ)) (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يكمن) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM الشر)) (PP-CLR (PREP في) (NP (PUNC ") (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تهديد) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN العالم))) (PP (PREP ب) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN مخاطر) (ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_GEN نووية)) (CONJ او) (NP (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تنظيم) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_GEN ائتلافات))) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN شن) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN حرب))))))) (PUNC "))) (PUNC ,) (PP-TMP (PREP في) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN حين) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يعمد) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM آخرون)) (PP-CLR (PREP الى) (NP (NP (PUNC ") (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN تقديم) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_PL+CASE_INDEF_GEN اقتراحات))) (CONJ و) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN فتح) (NP (NOUN+CASE_INDEF_GEN حوار))) (PUNC ")) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حل) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN المشاكل) (DET+ADJ+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN القائمة))))))))))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: to offer a proposal and begin a dialogue to work out the standing issues

example.arg: الى تقديم اقتراحات وفتح حوار لحل المشاكل القائمة
